name: Cathedral at Midnight Demo [PROJECT: Default Game Jam 2023]
name_original: Cathedral at Midnight Demo [PROJECT: Default Game Jam 2023]
description:
At midnight, in an abandoned Cathedral, a young Grogoyle and her brother are sneaking about in hopes of fixing their home. But they soon stumble upon a plot that would quickly lead to the war-torn city's doom.

----

This little demo was for a game jam I hosted called "PROJECT: Default.  2023" the jam aimed to make people create games with the default assets of RPG Maker.
